NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 YARROW: Are you ready, Privet? Using the electric core of Giant's Deep, the Deep Storm Station will soon power a 6-second negative time interval to test the mechanisms of the Ash Twin Project! 2 1 PRIVET: We're ready, Yarrow! I'll alert you of the probe's results as soon as I am paired to the memory statue, so please keep the projection stone engaged in conversation! 3 1 PRIVET: Kindly deactivate the station at once - I've been trying to write as fast as I can before the 6-second loop ends! 4 3 YARROW: My apologies! It appears Poke was standing closer to the memory statue in the station, and I was not paired as a result.. What do the Probe Tracking Module's records tell you, my friend? 5 4 PRIVET: Sadly, as predicted, a 6-second flight was nowhere sufficient to cover the calculated distance of the Eye's possible orbits. 6 5 PRIVET: The memory statues were activated to warn us of redundancy, after the probe elapsed 20 billion loops and began to repeat redundant flight trajectories. 7 6 YARROW: Though disappointing, this result means the Deep Storm Station succeeded in its foremost priorities; we can now be certain that all mechanics of the negative time interval are theoretically sound and functional. 8 7 YARROW: This knowledge brings me much relief. Once the Sun Station is complete, we can now be confident in its operation without fear of endangering our clan, the star system, and its precious lifeforms. CONV R1 1 DSS CONV5 6 Stowaways DSS 0 7
